body: @face_111: It's an artist called 肉棒魔羅ノ進 (nikuboumaranoshin). As much as I could find out this is only his second big work. His first puplished work seems to be the first story in WEEKLY Kairakuten 2021 No.09. He also has an oneshot in COMIC X-EROS #90. For a newbie he has an incredible erotic art style. I anticipate a promising future for him if he continues his way.
